metadata.title: CVE-2018-8831 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A Persistent XSS vulnerability exists in Kodi (formerly XBMC) through 17.6 that allows the execution of arbitrary HTML/script code in the context of the victim user's browser via a playlist.

criterions.comment: kodi package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
